subject: Re: [junit] what is the purpose of TestDecorator
msgSnippet: Srihari, TestSetup is a good example of a TestDecorator.  It performs setup before a suite of tests runs, and then tears down when the suite is done. Good luck
messageBody:
Srihari,

TestSetup is a good example of a TestDecorator. It performs setup
before a suite of tests runs, and then tears down when the suite is done.

Good luck on your presentation!

David Saff

venkata srihari wrote:

> Hello All,
>
> Tomorrow i have a presentation to give on JUnit. So kindly help me
> with some doubts.
>
> i need a description on how to use TestDecorator
> (junit.extensions.TestDecorator) and where we exactly use it. Give me
> a simple example if possible.
>
> i appreciate ur time ...
>
> thanks and regards,
> Srihari.
>
>
>
>
